java/liquibase/change/ExecuteShellCommandChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00006 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00007 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00008 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00009 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.io.IOException;
00015 import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
00016 import java.util.ArrayList;
00017 import java.util.List;
00018 import java.util.Set;
00019 
00023 public class ExecuteShellCommandChange extends AbstractChange {
00024 
00025     private String executable;
00026     private List<String> os;
00027     private List<String> args = new ArrayList<String>();
00028 
00029     public ExecuteShellCommandChange() {
00030         super("executeCommand", "Execute Shell Command");
00031     }
00032 
00033 
00034     public String getExecutable() {
00035         return executable;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public void setExecutable(String executable) {
00039         this.executable = executable;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void addArg(String arg) {
00043         this.args.add(arg);
00044     }
00045 
00046 
00047     public void setOs(String os) {
00048         this.os = StringUtils.splitAndTrim(os, ",");
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00052         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(executable) == null) {
00053             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("executable is required", this);
00054         }
00055 
00056     }
00057 
00058     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00059         boolean shouldRun = true;
00060         if (os != null && os.size() > 0) {
00061             String currentOS = System.getProperty("os.name");
00062             if (!os.contains(currentOS)) {
00063                 shouldRun = false;
00064                 LogFactory.getLogger().info("Not executing on os "+currentOS+" when "+os+" was specified");
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (shouldRun) {
00069             List<String> commandArray = new ArrayList<String>();
00070             commandArray.add(executable);
00071             commandArray.addAll(args);
00072 
00073             try {
00074                 ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder(commandArray);
00075                 pb.redirectErrorStream(true);
00076                 Process p = pb.start();
00077                 int returnCode = 0;
00078                 try {
00079                     returnCode = p.waitFor();
00080                 } catch (InterruptedException e) {
00081                     ;
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 ByteArrayOutputStream errorStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
00085                 ByteArrayOutputStream inputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
00086                 StreamUtil.copy(p.getErrorStream(), errorStream);
00087                 StreamUtil.copy(p.getInputStream(), inputStream);
00088 
00089                 LogFactory.getLogger().info(errorStream.toString());
00090                 LogFactory.getLogger().info(inputStream.toString());
00091 
00092                 if (returnCode != 0) {
00093                     throw new RuntimeException(getCommandString()+" returned an code of "+returnCode);
00094                 }
00095             } catch (IOException e) {
00096                 throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Error executing command: " + e);
00097             }
00098 
00099         }
00100         return new SqlStatement[0];
00101     }
00102 
00103     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00104         return "Shell command '" + getCommandString() + "' executed";
00105     }
00106 
00107     private String getCommandString() {
00108         return executable + " " + StringUtils.join(args, " ");
00109     }
00110 
00111     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00112         Element root = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00113         root.setAttribute("executable", getExecutable());
00114 
00115         for (String arg : args) {
00116             Element argElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("arg");
00117             argElement.setAttribute("value", arg);
00118             root.appendChild(argElement);
00119         }
00120 
00121         return root;
00122 
00123     }
00124 
00125     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00126         return null;
00127     }
00128 }
